articles.content:

articles.author: Ariel Edwards-Levy, CNN
articles.title: A new poll shows why some vaccine-hesitant Americans decided to get the Covid-19 shot - CNN
articles.description: Roughly one-fifth of Americans were initially hesitant about or squarely against getting the Covid-19 vaccine but have since gotten their shots, according to polling released Tuesday by the Kaiser Family Foundation.

articles.title: 'It's fair game': Brooks Koepka opens up on Bryson DeChambeau feud before British Open - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: In a riveting press conference, the world No 8 reveals the origin of his spat with his fellow American – and why they will never be high-fiving each other.
articles.content:
Covid-19 protocols may mean British Open press conferences are limited to 15 minutes, but no one could complain of feeling short-changed by Brooks Koepka.

articles.title: Covid-19 Cases Are Spiking … Uhh, Pretty Much Everywhere - Rolling Stone
articles.description: The highly contagious Delta variant is now the most dominant strain of the virus in America. Welcome to the "finding out" stage of the anti-vaccination push
articles.content:
Covid-19 vaccines are readily available and restrictions have been lifted across the country, but the pandemic is far from over. In fact, it’s starting to get worse.

articles.title: American suspect in Haiti president's assassination was 'confidential' DEA source - New York Post
